CHAT.comment: nina has had a bad cold this week. she has had a rather hectic week. she and her mother have gone out to dinner several times at friend's houses. last week+end they went to the beach in santa cruz. one can hear the other people who live in the house talking in the background during this taping session. nina is playing with her doll house. there is a box in front of her filled with furniture , wooden people , and other odds and ends. nina is taking various things out of the box and playing with them. she is putting the furniture in the various rooms of the doll house.

u.a: Nina has found a little plastic plane with a pilot inside it . Nina makes the gestures of making the plane fly
<4w> mispronounced .
<4w> mispronounced .
Nina had flown from boston to California ten days ago
<1w-3w> in a sing-song fashion

points to the door knob
the doll house is open at the back . Nina goes around to the back .
points to the door hinges
pushes the door open

there is a small plastic cowboy on the horse's back . Nina takes it off .
